website_summaries.verdict: A great bed with storage drawers and a trundle.
pros: Hides a trundle under the main bed
The bottom unit can be rolled completely out
cons: The 200-pound weight limit makes this a better choice for children than adults

customer_reviews.title: The only thing i dont like is that the trundle isnt on a type of ...
customer_reviews.text: The only thing i dont like is that the trundle isnt on a type of rail to guide it back under the bed. But in all fairness, i couldnt found one that has that capability. The bed frame is great. I recieved my headboard damaged and the company sent me a replacement headboard quickly and easily. I definately recommend this bed.
customer_reviews.author: debbie campbell

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy with this purchase. Two of the 3 drawers were damaged when I opened the boxes. I tried calling them but no answer. They do not respond to emails either. Waiting Waiting Waiting
customer_reviews.author: JPP

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bed
customer_reviews.text: We really love the new bed. It is well constructed and made of real wood and looks great. Our only disappointment was that it came with a crack on the headboard - it was sort of a weird paint/wood type crack. The box itself was not damaged so this was something done before packing. We were able to paint it with some white paint and it hides it pretty well. We toyed with the idea of sending it back, but we had already unboxed it, cleared my son's room and carved out a day to put it together. Overall happy with the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Staggs

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good price
customer_reviews.text: Good product, good price, and fast shipping. It took about 2 hrs to put the bed together with 2 people. The reason I gave 4 stars because there was a little problem with one of the drawers didn't work properly but customer service took good care of the issue and sent me another drawer and it works good now. It works very good for my 3 year-old boy. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you get the right size mattress
customer_reviews.text: We received our kit and my husband was able to put it together fairly quickly. It's a nice looking bed and fairly solid. I had purchased 2 10inch mattresses for this trundle set up. I would recommend getting the smaller mattresses. 10 inches is definitely too thick for the trundle. It will not pull out or push in with ease with that size mattress. Thankfully we do not need the bed, it is just a back up. Thought I would share what I learned in an effort to help others who may also be thinking thicker os better.
customer_reviews.author: Doris Decker

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. I love the storage drawers under the ...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely lover this bed. Great quality. I love the storage drawers under the trundle. Beautiful wood. It did some in several boxes which did not arrive on the same day. One of the pieces was cracked and they mailed us a new piece free of charge. Great service. I highly recommend because the look of this bed is great.
customer_reviews.author: Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase! Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say, I was skeptical at first. But thank god I took my chances. My husband and I put this together in no time. All boxes and pieces came all in one day and not a single piece was damaged. It’s great quality wood especially for the price. So far so great! Only downfall is I didn’t see a weight limit when purchased. So I seen it was 312lbs. Which is fine but then my husband and myself and my child can’t all lay on the bed together for story time. But that’s ok- didn’t see it defecting my rating. Be aware the espresso colored set is dark colored.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great set for limited space and added storage drawers. Love it. I am changing my rating on this due to the wheel breaking after just 4 months and we went shopping for a new wheel and couldn't find one in any store so now I need to contact the seller and see what they have. Fun Fun! Nothing is built to last anymore.
customer_reviews.author: R Walker

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Love this piece so far. A woman in my 30s and I built it today by myself in three hours. It feels and looks like great quality. Drawers move smoothly and I just wish they were a little deeper so that I didn’t feel like more closet storage was needed for my sons pants, socks and pjs. With that said, super happy!!!
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Great quality of bed if it doesn't arrive broken
customer_reviews.text: This arrived with almost all the main boards (headboard, drawers ect) broken. We had to call the manufacturer for new pieces and had to send them prof pictures of everything that was broken and pictures of the boxes plus prof of receipt which was a pain in my ass then we had to wait another 2-3 weeks for the new bed pieces to arrive. Now with that said the bed is great, sturdy and great quality for the price and my daughter loves it, but Amazon does not package it well enough and half of it arrives broken.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bed- great value
customer_reviews.text: The bed itself is a great bed. It did arrive with a little damage but I was able to sand down the spot and I had paint that was a very very close match. The bed part arrived a little before it was scheduled, but the drawers didn’t come until nearly a week later. Overall, I’m very happy with the bed! My 4 year old loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Cassi J

customer_reviews.title: Good bed but drawers don't hold up to daily use
customer_reviews.text: Decent bed. Tall with mattress on. Drawers (used for jammies) didn't last longer than a year and a half. Had to put new screws and tape to fix the rollers to the drawers to continue to use them.
customer_reviews.author: averageconsumer

customer_reviews.title: The bed is really pretty and sturdy but I reduced 2 stars for the ...
customer_reviews.text: The bed is really pretty and sturdy but I reduced 2 stars for the faulty slats which broke after a month of use. If you look closely they were already broken and mended once.
customer_reviews.author: Sagar

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Shipment arrived as scheduled. It comes in four boxes and is fairly heavy. Assembly is fairly straight forward and will take a couple of hours. The completed bed appears sturdy and well constructed. Note: This bed is tall. A12in. top mattress is way too high. Rx a 6-8in. When unpacking we found a split/cracked top rail on one of the headboards. I contacted their customer service who, after sending them pictures and invoice, had a replacement on the way.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Great bed
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my son who lives 1400 miles away. I was nervous about what the quality of the unit would be buy was elated when my son called after assembling it. He said it is a very nice and sturdy unit and that his children, who are somewhat roughnecks, love it and their rough housing has had no bad affects on the bed.
customer_reviews.author: CooleGuy

customer_reviews.title: Decent bed, nothing fancy
customer_reviews.text: While not anything great, it's a decent bed for the price. I would not say it is made of high quality materials, especially the trundle roll-out. But, for a toddler who doesn't have a lot of weight to throw around, it's just fine. The price is very reasonable, assembly was not difficult. And the bed itself, though not solid, is not unstable. I don't know how much time we'll get out of it but for the time being it is a solid deal. If you're looking for something to last 10 years, look elsewhere. If you need something quick for a young child or a guest room, this is a pretty good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan J.

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: We baught this bed for my daughter. It has exceeded my expectations! My husband assembled it on his own without difficulty. It is sturdy and has everything we were looking for. The trundle is easy enough to pull out and the storage draws hold all the little knickknacks that used to clutter her floor. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: gingrica

customer_reviews.title: Great choice!
customer_reviews.text: It only took me and my neighbor with her baby strapped to her back 3 hours to put this together. :) Worth it! My toddler daughter loves her big girl bed, and we keep the trundle pulled out halfway every night so that we don't need to worry about her rolling off. Sturdy, well made and reasonable to put together. It did, howver, arrive in about 9 HUGE boxes, so be prepared to spend your saturday unpacking, building, then cleaning up.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Mooradian

customer_reviews.title: Great bed! Trundle fits 6 inc mattress not bigger
customer_reviews.text: Great bed! Trundle fits 6 inc mattress not bigger ! Thanks amazon for another great find ! Easy , accommodating delivery through Zenith . Very nice , I had to cancel the day before a blizzard and my delivery .... no problem !!!
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Calosso

customer_reviews.title: Who needs Pottery Barn, Broyhill kids delivers!
customer_reviews.text: Who needs to pay Pottery Barn prices for awesome quality? I have purchased furniture online with a lot of disappointment. Swore only pottery barn could deliver a great piece of furniture in perfect condition. Love this bed for my 2 year old son. He loves it just as much. Easy to put together. And for the price you cant beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Balle

customer_reviews.title: Impressively easy to install!
customer_reviews.text: Product comes in four (4) boxes. Initial delivery had one large box damaged but after I reported it, the replacement package came in after a couple of days. Once un-boxed, the directions were straightforward and all components were labelled clearly. Took me less than an hour to install everything. Feels sturdy too! If there is a con, it would be that the wheels are too small (hard to roll on a carpet), and the drawers only go halfway the width of the bed - but that's noted on the description so I was aware even before it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Eeeks

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 5 year old granddaughter and had it shipped to their house. I wasn't there, but I hear that the assembly wasn't too difficult. I have seen it since, and the quality appears to be decent for the price. My granddaughter really likes it, so all is good.
customer_reviews.author: Rick P

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Choice for a Full Sized Bed with Trundle
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice and sturdy bed. I was super impressed. Set up was pretty simple and instructions were easy to follow. There were a total of 4 boxes. Make sure to get a full mattress that is 54" or you will see the slates,. I had to return the first mattress after I noticed this. I will probably re-enforce the wooden slates with hardwood for some additional support as my child gets older. I bought this bed from Amazon got an excellent deal!!
customer_reviews.author: tdemeritt

customer_reviews.title: Trundle Bed Assembly Parts Missing
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this trundle bed for my great grandchildren. Some parts were missing and my daughter and son-in-law had to drive three hours to a home depot (as they live hours from a medium size city) to get the parts i.e. screw, nut and bolt parts so that they could finish putting the bed together. They say it's well make. It was just unfortunate that some of the assembly parts were missing.....
customer_reviews.author: bkd1970

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: My experience buying this product was terrible. Paint was chipped. Support frame got broken after a week of use ( I only weight 125lbs). It took about two hour to assemble it and another hour for dissembled it (of course I’m returning this). Don’t waste your money and time!!!
customer_reviews.author: Livington A.

customer_reviews.title: Not gonna lie...
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous for my role in assembly production when this bed arrived in 4 huge-a boxes! But it took only a couple hours to put together and was fairly straight-forward. The bed is sturdy and nice. This exact bed is for sale on multiple sites but Amazon has the best value when you add in shipping costs and timeliness of delivery.
customer_reviews.author: DKF

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, very nice looking
customer_reviews.text: So far, I really like the quality and look of this bed. It was easy enough to put together and nothing came damaged. There were 4 boxes total which arrived 2 days apart. I was really concerned about finding a mattress small enough to fit the trundle but there was plenty of room. I wound up getting a 7" mattress from Ikea for the trundle and there is still a bit of room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: SwissyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great product & beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 and these are really Great beds. Great Quality everything came in order. Really nice quality...not some cheap flimpsy beds.
customer_reviews.author: LifeisGood

customer_reviews.title: Support in the Full bed prevents the trundle mattress from fitting!
customer_reviews.text: Very poor design. The support in the middle of the full bed does not allow for an 8 inch mattress to fit and still roll the trundle drawer to shut all the way! You would have to get a very thin mattress to put in the twin trundle underneath . I would not have purchased the full bed option had I known this.
customer_reviews.author: Peter J

customer_reviews.title: I really like this bed
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bed. Took me and my husband to put it together, but was easy enough, just timely. I like the pull out option. It rolls out pretty easy. Looks great in my kids room.
customer_reviews.author: LLacours

customer_reviews.title: Happy unhappy
customer_reviews.text: Upon unboxing, this bed has a huge dent on the top of the foot board. There were no instructions included so we had to figure it out on our own to put together. Lucky we have experience in building boxed furniture and were able to get it done. Tried the website to see if they had instructions online but could t find any. That would be helpful for putting together this product when customer service is not available. That said I am happy with the product but disappointed in the quality control.
customer_reviews.author: gretchen diehl

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, definitely easier than other beds we have had to put together. Good value for your money. The only thing, not really a bad thing- is the height with the mattress makes it taller and harder for my toddler to get into-but he loves it because he gets to literally “jump into bed”. Because of the quality, I can see him grow into as years come. Drawers easy to close and open-We like that we did away with a dresser in his room.
customer_reviews.author: ROEL R.

customer_reviews.title: Decent, but not great
customer_reviews.text: The quality is mostly good, but the main problem is the wheel structure and integrity on the pullout bed. They're not sturdy and do not rotate. They broke and it's very difficult to replace and fix given the positioning of the holes. Otherwise it's a pretty good product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Bed!
customer_reviews.text: I dont write reviews but this bed needed one... the bed i received was 100% perfect! I have zero complaints about it. Every piece was individual wrapped and not one single mark/scuff or dent. Put it together within and hour and again no issues. All the holes lined up and went together smoothly! Honestly, if i paid 800 bucks for this bed I would of still been happy!
customer_reviews.author: Sonny

customer_reviews.title: Great's except half way thru we found cracked wood pieces =(
customer_reviews.text: Only problem was the wood on the inner piece came completely cracked, other than that it's a wonderful bed.. very heavy BUT STURDY! Great for kiddos sharing a room!
customer_reviews.author: Zoran Jagrovic

customer_reviews.title: Not made for carpeted floors.
customer_reviews.text: The trundle portion not meant for use on carpet. Had to replace and repair wheels and drawers on the trundle portion multiple times. After 2 years of repairing every 6 months i Finally gave up and replaced trundle with a metal trundle bedframe from wal mart. Not the quality I would have expected from broyhill.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: The bed itself its actually great and easy enough to assemble, the only downside is the delivery, the boxes(it comes in 4 different boxes) were thrown on my porch and some parts were damaged, the bed rails weren't even IN boxes just pieces of wood randomly left outside my door
customer_reviews.author: C.C.M

customer_reviews.title: Great value and and quality
customer_reviews.text: It's looks great in my kids room, took about an hour to assemble. I loved the fact that the drawer came pre-assembled. The package arrived in perfect conditionsand and well packed (you will have a ton of Styrofoam pieces so keep a trash bag handy)
customer_reviews.author: Jorge R. Villaverde

customer_reviews.title: ... scratches to one of the drawers but over all happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: We received the shipment within days of each other there were very minor scratches to one of the drawers but over all happy with the product. It is not the best quality wood but it is worth the $400 we spent. Assembly was easy enough (according to my husband).
customer_reviews.author: Kt

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this item
customer_reviews.text: The wood is very flimsy and not sturdy at all. There are a way too many pieces. The shipment arrived damage and the very cheap quality wood was easily damaged by the poorly assembled box. The company doesn't stand by the product and won't pay to have it shipped back to them. They don't want the bed back either. I don't blame them. Don't buy this item.
customer_reviews.author: michelle demers

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful !
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and a beautiful piece of furnature for my teen's bedroom!!!!! Also came packaged well with easy to follow instructions ...and in separated boxes for ease moving it into the house and the room I needed it in! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Mel D.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does not ship easily comes in multiple boxes husband put it together pretty easy though, great guest bed.
customer_reviews.author: CAROL ANNICHIARICO

customer_reviews.title: Great looking!
customer_reviews.text: We love this bed for our granddaughter's room. We purchased a matching white board for the back side to shore up the sturdiness/squareness. Easy and inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Lovemylife!

customer_reviews.title: Good bed for kid's room
customer_reviews.text: The bed is good but they shipped it without parts, second time it was damage (,no appropriate shipping patting). But, once it was finally here... looks good
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It took 2.5 hours with 2 people assembling it but it’s worth it. My son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bed, good price, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Great bed for my daughter. She loves it. Easy directions, everything fit and all pieces came with product. Sturdy and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Udovodoo

customer_reviews.title: Double check for broken/damaged parts!
customer_reviews.text: Love the captains bed - price is high for the product but would be worth it if parts weren't damaged prolonging the assembly of the product. Sturdy product. MP
customer_reviews.author: MPeoples - cpm@ Director of Compliance

customer_reviews.title: Nice bed and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy bed It did not come with plugs to cover the screws but I’m very happy with the color and the way it went together
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Love these beds
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my grandkids room. They are super sturdy and very attractive. Everyone that comes over raves about how great they look. My grands love them especially the trundle! I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: nina

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Would do better if the trundle had railings to slide bed in and out, so it doesn’t come all the way out.
customer_reviews.author: Chayten O.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this bed for my 10-year old daughter to grow into. I was a little skeptical about purchasing such a big piece of furniture online, but after receiving it and putting it together, my concerns vanished. The assembly wasn’t so bad, took me longer than anticipated, as I decided to take the project on without my husband’s help. The bed looks great, I’m extremely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Noemi McCormick

customer_reviews.title: Great bead for young kids and should last through high school.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I put this bed together with ease but make sure the parts are all the right lengths before starting.
customer_reviews.author: tommy lara

customer_reviews.title: Good bed.
customer_reviews.text: I like the bed. I was a bit disappoint that the headboard rail has a crack in it. Does not like to roll on carpet very well. Not the manufacturers fault. Make sure to get the right size mattress for the bottom bunk. It has to be a specific height.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great value, great bed. My 5 year old daughter loves it. It took me 40 min by myself to move the 4 boxes and prep every single part in my daughters room. After that it took me exactly 2 hours to complete assembly. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MAX

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces or guest rooms!!
customer_reviews.text: Slight difficulty assembling product. Once past that obstacle, this is definitely worth the money, looks great and is very functional for small room or guest area.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: we love it! Works great in our toddler/preschool's room
customer_reviews.text: we love it! Works great in our toddler/preschool's room. The bed is high but our almost 4 yr old managed to find a way to climb in just fine or uses a step stool. LOVE the 3 drawers below and the trundle we look forward to using once we get a mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Jason A Neal

customer_reviews.title: Great bed! Not difficult to put together!
customer_reviews.text: So far this bed is great! I’m a little nervous that the slats are wooden, as my kids are not the most gentle. This was not hard to put together, and it looks great! Definitely need a bed 8 inches or less in the trundle portion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s easy to assemble and so practical for kids who share a room or for guests!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the everything about this bed especially the trundle and drawers for extra storage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bed
customer_reviews.text: It is great but had 2 dents in the wood. Otherwise would have given 5 stars. Perfect for my son’s big boy room
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha J. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great bed.
customer_reviews.text: Great bed. Easy to put together. The draws come premade so you just have to slide them in. I was a little overwhelmed with the four boxes that arrived, but it was simple wit clear instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish bed for a kid!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the dark grey color with trundle. Awesome bed, looks much more expensive that it was, and is very functional with both drawers and an extra bed. Love it! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sheri T

customer_reviews.title: Horrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: My kids love the bed, it's not the sturdiest bed it does feel a little cheaply built. The worst part was one of the drawers came damaged and trying to get a replacement has been a nightmare. Customer Service is really difficult to deal with, I would not suggest buying this due to them.
customer_reviews.author: Nfranco

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to put together with my hubby
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put together with my hubby. Took about 2 hours. Quality wood and product. Make sure to get a smaller 6” twin bed for the trifle. Anything bigger probably won’t fit. Great item. Will probably get the full over twin for my other kiddo.
customer_reviews.author: colleen

customer_reviews.title: Captain's Bed
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my grandson. Loves it. Very good looking bed, perfect fit in the room.
customer_reviews.author: Granny

customer_reviews.title: But it
customer_reviews.text: Dispite the shipping issue. Witch got fixed quickly. My 4 year old loves it. It's a bed she can grow into. And start having sleep overs. Perfect match for her unicorn room. In our new house.
customer_reviews.author: LAUREN Rush

customer_reviews.title: Good bed for lighter folks
customer_reviews.text: It seems like a decent bed. Fairly sturdy for lighter people. If a semi heavier person (150+) is going to sleep on it I would add a piece of wood on top of the slats to give it a little more rigidity. As far as style goes it looks good. Mine did not have any scuffs or dings
customer_reviews.author: Greg R.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: It's great for our kids! They love it and it goes great with the theme! Would buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Good price for a nice bed.
customer_reviews.text: Great bed for my daughter. Super easy to assemble. One of the 4 boxes was delayed, but otherwise very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great bed for small spaces.
customer_reviews.text: Love this bed. We bought a similar one, but my husband found this one easier to put together and the trundle is also really easy to pull out. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Luci H

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: The bed was delivered faster than expected. It was not hard to assemble and all the hardware pieces were there. My daughter loves it. I read in one of the comments that the bed did not roll well on the carpet but we do not have a problem with it at all. It rolls just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Agnieszka Front

customer_reviews.title: My boys love it We pull the bottom out every single night ...
customer_reviews.text: We had a broken piece arrive but they took care of it immediately. My boys love it We pull the bottom out every single night and it runs strong 💙💙💙💙💙
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our son. Took a little longer than expected to assemble but very sturdy and appears to be good quality.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Our son picked out this bed and loves it. One of the boxes arrived in pour condition but I believe it was from the bed being so heavy. It is well made and heavy duty. We would purchase it again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bed overall - It looks really nice - great for a boy's room or girl's room; can't go wrong with white furniture. There are some build quality issues as noted by most other buyers, but they are not big issues. The knobs are very cheap plastic, and the railing for the drawers has a bit of build integrity issues - rails are not all perfectly sized, so some of the drawers open/close smoothly and others do not - you may have to keep switching the rails to find a compatible pair. There are 3 drawers, 2 are perfect, one is rather off-placed, making it sound and feel like the rails will eventually bend on one side..
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: but drawer still slides easily. Just moves right to left- I will try ...
customer_reviews.text: Took over two hours to assemble by myself. Quality okay. One knob did not assemble well- had to replace screw. Middle drawer metal was a bit bent, but drawer still slides easily. Just moves right to left- I will try to fix one day. Great space saver especially being a full size main bed. Great color. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: alison

customer_reviews.title: The only
customer_reviews.text: Amazing bed, strong estructure I LOVE IT!!! Easy to assemble, but if you are in two it’s faster. Try to use an electrical screwdriver for the slats its hard to do it by hand
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and speedy delivery
customer_reviews.text: Great product and speedy delivery. Lots of boxes and parts to put together, but so worth it. My daughter is in love with this bed.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan M.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and roomy
customer_reviews.text: Had to get a missing box replaced, took a little effort but got it! Wouldn't say easy to assemble, but not too bad. Sturdy and roomy. Really like it!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for price
customer_reviews.text: The bed itself is beautiful and well made. I bought it for my son who has yet to use it, but when we have guests it’s nice to have the trundle.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Rhea

customer_reviews.title: quality was ok when I put together. one section ...
customer_reviews.text: quality was ok when I put together. one section however in the trendel was split. I did reach out to the company but months later still no response, I resolved the issue with metal plates, glue and screws.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Great bed but the product was cracked
customer_reviews.text: The headboard was cracked from the one end to about the middle. There was also a large chunk of wood that fell out from where it was cracked.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bed
customer_reviews.text: I got this bed for my granddaughter. She loves is it. It is beautiful. It is nice having the second bed under and drawers.
customer_reviews.author: Heather B.

customer_reviews.title: Love this trundle and the drawers...
customer_reviews.text: We like it! Not 5 stars just yet because when I push the trundle back in it goes in crookedly so you really have to balance it out when pushing it back in. Other than that we love it! -1 start because I wish the drawers were bigger. There's definitely more storage space that can be utilized under there.
customer_reviews.author: Jenerica1

customer_reviews.title: Love the bed but a little hard to put together
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty bed. It was rough putting it together (it took about 3.5 hours) It seems to be very sturdy. Only complaint is one of the drawers is hard to pull out. Putting the screws in where the slats go was very difficult to do and some screws would not go all the way down.
customer_reviews.author: carla Burns

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Surprised at the quality of construction. Easy to assemble. I had some minor damage but I can assure you that it was from the shipping. Every part was intact and everything fit.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Zocco

customer_reviews.title: Great bed
customer_reviews.text: We love it. Our 6 year old loves it!!! Took time to put together but well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: kristine goncalves

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this bed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed for my 13 year old daughter and after a few days it started making creaking sound every time she moves. The top bed is not sturdy the bottom bed is more sturdier than the top.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and just as expected
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and just as expected. I would only suggest to make the assembly instructions a bit better... Very satisfied with the rest.
customer_reviews.author: donnygerman78

customer_reviews.title: My grandson loves his new bed!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the bed and it was easy to assemble. My grandson is thrilled to have room for a friend to spend the night now. Product exceeded my expectation.
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: Great bed, a few minor dings
customer_reviews.text: The bed is just what we wanted and hoped for, but it did have a few dings in it, likely from shipping,,,,, and some of the wood had a manufacturing flaw. We still love it!
customer_reviews.author: THCampbell924

customer_reviews.title: High quality and attractive.
customer_reviews.text: It looks like high end furniture. Sturdy, attractive, and functional. Assembly wasn’t difficult, just a bit tedious due to the good craftsmanship. Lots of screws...I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time all at once... good quality for the price ...
customer_reviews.author: afaf wehby

customer_reviews.title: The bed was easy to put together and my daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was a complete nightmare. Packages were separated and delayed twice. 100%UPS's FAULT!! The bed was easy to put together and my daughter loves it. Good quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing hardware...
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this bed two stars due to the fact that the boxes showed up missing one of the hardware packs. So while I was able to put the bed together, the parts for trundle are sitting underneath, waiting for the parts to arrive. Not a good experience so far.
customer_reviews.author: csilveira

customer_reviews.title: Best Kids Beds
customer_reviews.text: Everything came in great shape and I purchased 2 of these beds, very very easy to put together very nice quality and really nice color, supper happy!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Moya

customer_reviews.title: Nice bed but wish the slide out portion was connected ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice bed but wish the slide out portion was connected to the main bed with some type of guides or slides
customer_reviews.author: astronuget

customer_reviews.title: this bed is just beautiful! It's very well built
customer_reviews.text: this bed is just beautiful! It's very well built. On line I was a little worried for the price it wouldn't be of great quality, but it is. My grandkids love it!
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie S. Dicho

customer_reviews.title: Great for our granddaughters
customer_reviews.text: arrived on time and went together perfectly. Great for our granddaughters room
customer_reviews.author: glswrp

customer_reviews.title: Not so sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: Shipped in with defect, later center bar broke. Customer Service is great but the replacement orders came in too slow.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Good bed, Bad packaging
customer_reviews.text: Nice, sturdy bed. I gave it 4 stars because it was damaged in 2 places when we received it and the package was left in very rainy and windy weather. I work close to home so i was able to run home and put the packages inside. It came in 3 separate boxes so it was easy for 1 person to move.
customer_reviews.author: Don

product_meta.title: StorkCraft Marco Island Full Captain's Bed with Trundle, White
product_meta.description: The Storkcraft Marco Island Full Captain’s Bed features a pull-out twin trundle bed with three functioning spacious drawers to bring style and functionality to any bedroom. Made from high-quality solid hardwood and composites, the Marco Island Full Captain’s Bed is sturdy and built for years of enjoyment. This bed is versatile as the included twin-size trundle bed has three functioning drawers, and the trundle can easily be wheeled in and out from under the bed to maximize space. You can rest easy knowing that this bed is safe as it is ASTM Certified and meets CPSC safety standards. Offered in multiple rich, non-toxic finishes, the Storkcraft Marco Island Full Captain’s Bed is the ultimate choice for any bedroom and is sure to last you for many years.
feature_bullets: STYLE & FUNCTION: The Marco Island Full Captain's Bed features a pull-out twin trundle bed with three functioning spacious drawers to bring style and functionality to any bedroom. Made from solid hardwood and composites, it's built for years of enjoyment.

VERSATILITY: The included twin-size trundle bed with 3 functioning drawers can easily be wheeled in and out for maximum storage space. Offered in multiple rich, non-toxic finishes, the Marco Island Captain's Bed is the ultimate choice for any bedroom.

EXTRA TWIN BED: When space is at a premium, the Marco Island Captain's Bed can give you room to spare. Whether you're expecting company or making the most of a tight space, this trundle bed gives you an extra twin bed without sacrificing square footage.

COMPLETE BEDROOM SOLUTION: Storkcraft manufactures products for the total infant, kid’s, or teen bedroom solution, including changing tables, dressers, glider rocker chairs, mattresses, beds, and bunk beds from brands like Graco, Thomasville, or Broyhill.

UNIQUE QUALITY: For 70 years, Storkcraft has been manufacturing quality furniture for infants, toddlers, kids, and teens. Compare our line of innovative products to those from Dorel, Angel Line, DHP, Zinus, South Shore, Delta Children or Dream on Me.
